name: SweClockers-Dark
description: A modern dark theme for SweClockers

scripts.compile: npm run clean & stylus src/sweclockers-dark.styl -o dist/sweclockers-dark.css && node scripts/compile.js
scripts.compile-windows: npm run clean-windows & stylus src/sweclockers-dark.styl -o dist/sweclockers-dark.css && node scripts/compile.js
